name: Night Frights
description:
I'm afraid. These horrible monsters are coming to kill me. Help me, please.

In this short horror experience, you'll become a small child whose worst nightmares have come to life.

To help him, you'll have to look around and avoid the monsters, while also avoiding falling asleep. Will you be able to make it through the night?

Controls are in game, but you'll only need a mouse.

It is recommended you play in fullscreen, with sound on, and if possible, in dark, for best experience.

I hope you enjoy this game! 😊

(Made in 72h by TheInkSkeleton for Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the inevitable)
